mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_test (review_no, review_pw, review_hit, review_content, review_festmid, review_memid, review_memnickname) VALUES (#{reviewNo}, #{reviewPw}, #{reviewHit}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewFestmid}, #{reviewMemid}, #{reviewMemnickname})
